name: Dungeons and Dragons: The Rise of Warduke
name_original: Dungeons and Dragons: The Rise of Warduke
description: Dungeons and Dragons: Rise of Warduke is a fan-made Action RPG developed by Count Monte on the OpenBOR engine. Set in the classic D&D realm of Greyhawk, this sprawling, massive game features the mysterious Warduke bringing war after years of peace. The king has enlisted you to stop him. The game features inventory items, random encounters, collectible spells, special attacks, a coliseum to test your mettle, AI vs. AI battles, mini-games, side quests, and more.
